item.title: Official images of the Sportage exterior have been shared by Kia
item.description: Source: Kia Motors. The Sportage. Kia Motors has released the first official pictures of the exterior of the newest Kia Sportage. Its worldwide debut will take place at the Frankfurt International Motor Show on September 15, 2015. Now in its fourth generation, the completely redesigned Kia Sportage takes inspiration from modern fighter jets, incorporating a blend of smooth and angular elements for a sportier, more streamlined appearance. The most noticeable change is to the front end.
